comments.body: I think it would probably be ok to just consolidate to `to_native(e)` instead of the try/except here.  Thoughts @abadger ?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +109,113 @@                    raise type(e)(to_native(variable) + ': ' + e.message)
                except AttributeError:
                    raise type(e)(to_native(variable) + ': ' + to_native(e))
            return value
